description:
Cabaji is a deadly acrobatic fighter, he has displayed a fondness for using both daggers and a swords during his fights.
*Abilities:
Cabaji fights with a combination of swordplay and acrobatics (mostly on a unicycle) to fight his enemies. Most of his attacks have Carnival Trick based names.
He is not afraid to play dirty and take advantage of weakened foes and will strike a wounded man when he is already hurt without a second thought. He attacks Zoro in this very manner.
name: Cabaji
